attributes.action: Create a law under which Social Workers and those responsible for the care of others face criminal charges for the death / serious injury of those under their care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have seen too many cases where people under "the care" of social workers etc die..public enquiries are not enough and when children are tortured to death, the social workers walk away!
They should be held responsible for the NEGLECT of their responsibility.
